meanings: a shameless[an attractive, a tempting] offer

vlive.korean: [뻔뻔] 이러면 안 되는 거죠? [Bold] This is an example of failure, right? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [Bold] This is an example of failure, right?

vlive.korean: [뻔뻔] 아니 우리 각자 챌린지가 있는데 그걸 왜 침범해? [Brazen] I mean, we have separate challenges. Why do you ignore that? 듣기 View video TWICE : 트와이스 복자매 나모의 “도전! ASMR” EP.01
vlive.english: [Brazen] I mean, we have separate challenges. Why do you ignore that?

vlive.korean: [뻔뻔 뻔뻔] 사람 아니에요 마네킹인데? [Shameless] It's not a person. It's a mannequin. 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.14 MBTI of SVT
vlive.english: [Shameless] It's not a person. It's a mannequin.

vlive.korean: [뻔뻔] - 그거라고? - 설마 형 저랑 통했어요? [Brazenly] - I get it. - You have the same one as mine? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.86
vlive.english: [Brazenly] - I get it. - You have the same one as mine?

vlive.korean: [뻔뻔주의][갓세븐 공식 스니키] [음소거 웃음] 진짜... [Caution: Shameless][GOT7's official sneaky man] [Muted laughter] Oh really... 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7(갓세븐) HOTLINE #13
vlive.english: [Caution: Shameless][GOT7's official sneaky man] [Muted laughter] Oh really...
